ygData.subject: commands comment
ygData.msgSnippet: For those of ya ll that have some of the expansions and I think even the basic set. If you look in the directory with the game files... there s a file
ygData.messageBody:
For those of ya'll that have some of the
expansions and I think even the basic set.<br><br>If you
look in the directory with the game files... there's a
file called eqmanual_supplement.doc and one that's in
txt format as well.<br><br>If you open that up, it's
got a list of a LOT of different things. One of the
key things is that it gives an example of time
delayed macros and almost all the commands you'd ever
need to know. Ideally one would print it out and thumb
through it (but I've never done it yet like a doof.
LOL)<br><br>Anyhoo.. figured ppl asking about this stuff would want to
know.<br><br>Fatedhue Prismatic<br>Just reached 39 and love my GD gg
spell. Heh<br>shooman out-- Drinal server
